solution_line_template: Jeremey goes through {eats_per_week}+{gives_to_dad_per_week}=<<{eats_per_week}+{gives_to_dad_per_week}={total_consumed_per_week}>>{total_consumed_per_week} watermelons per week.
Therefore, the watermelons will last him to {initial_watermelons}/{total_consumed_per_week}=<<{initial_watermelons}/{total_consumed_per_week}={weeks_last}>>{weeks_last} weeks.
